message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business.  It's worth at least $1,000,000 to me, and I know it holds the same value for you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,000,000.  This is a fair price considering the product's worth.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details further.
